node.name: CRUD Booster
node.shortdescription:
CRUD Booster is a new plugin (now available for M2Spring and M2Code for Java) that enables you to easily generate working CRUD applications in few seconds, including the GUI, only and directly from a single class diagram. The CRUD Booster plugin is the better way to rapidly design, create, prototype and deploy Enterprise Application.

CRUD Booster transformation process

1. Create UML Entities Class Diagram

Business Entities
Detailed attributes data types
Entities associations and relationships
Dedicated UML stereotypes and annotations

2. Generate UML Diagrams and user interfaces

CRUD activities diagrams
User interface mock-up
User interaction and services execution
Enhanced UML diagrams with UML profiles

3. Generate Application source code

100% Java EE source code generation
Web based or RIA application
Multi-layer technical architecture
Entities persistence and services implementation

The CRUD Booster plugin is the better way to rapidly design, create, prototype and deploy Enterprise Application.
